channel.title: Server panel error?

item.title: Server panel error?
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

now I got this error:

client.java:179: cannot find symbol symbol : variable serverpanel location: class client if(serverpanel) ^ client.java:183: cannot find symbol symbol : variable serverpanel location: class client else if(!serverpanel) ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

Read full topic

item.title: Server panel error?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You don’t put the whole code inside the process, you declare the method outside of it. Once you have declared it, you add:

loadPanel();

to the process method.

Read full topic

item.title: Server panel error?
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

? the whole code looks like:

[code] public boolean process() { --------- (in boolean process.)

public void loadPanel() {
String line = “”;
String token = “”;
String token2 = “”;
String[]token3 = new String[3];
boolean EndOfFile = false;
int ReadMode = 0;
BufferedReader characterfile = null;
boolean panelFound = false;

try {
  characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./config/panels.txt"));
  panelFound = true;
} catch (FileNotFoundException fileex1) {
}

try {
  line = characterfile.readLine();
} catch (IOException ioexception) {
  misc.println(playerName+": error loading file.");
}
while (EndOfFile == false && line != null) {
  line = line.trim();
  int spot = line.indexOf("=");
  if (spot > -1) {
    token = line.substring(0, spot);
    token = token.trim();
    token2 = line.substring(spot+1);
    token2 = token2.trim();
    token3 = token2.split("\t");
    switch (ReadMode) {
      case 1:
        if (token.equals("server-panel1")) {
            mypanel1 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel2")) {
            mypanel2 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel3")) {
            mypanel3 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel4")) {
            mypanel4 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel5")) {
            mypanel5 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel6")) {
            mypanel6 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel7")) {
            mypanel7 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel8")) {
            mypanel8 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel9")) {
            mypanel9 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel10")) {
            mypanel10 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel11")) {
            mypanel11 = (token2);
        }
        break;
    }
  } else {
    if (line.equals("[PANELS]"))
      ReadMode = 1;
     else if (line.equals("[EOF]")) {
      //end of file now do whatever you set.	
      try {
        characterfile.close();
      } catch (IOException ioexception) {
      }
    }
  }

  //Exception occured @ some line
  try {
    line = characterfile.readLine();
  } catch (IOException ioexception1) {
    EndOfFile = true;
  }
}

try {
  characterfile.close();
} catch (IOException ioexception) {
}

}
public void WritePanel()
{

	int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
	String status = "";
	String tag = "";
	if(playerRights == 0) {
		status = "TEXT HERE";
	} else if(playerRights == 0) {
		status = "TEXT HERE";
	} else if(playerRights == 1) {
		status = "TEXT HERE";
	} else if(playerRights == 2) {
		status = "TEXT HERE";
	} else if(playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
		status = "TEXT HERE";
	} else if(playerRights == 3 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) {
		status = "TEXT HERE";
	} else if(playerRights >= 4) {
		status = "TEXT HERE";
	}
	if(players == 1) {
		tag = "Player";
	} else if(players >= 2) {
		tag = "Players";
	}

	sendQuest(mypanel5, 15894); //Title

	sendQuest("@whi@" + players + " " + tag + " Online", 15895);
	sendQuest("@whi@Updates-" + mypanel4, 15897);
	sendQuest("@whi@Your status: " + status, 15898);
	sendQuest(mypanel3, 15899);
	sendQuest(mypanel2, 15900);
	sendQuest(mypanel1, 15901);

	sendQuest(mypanel6, 15896);
	sendQuest(mypanel7, 15902);
	sendQuest(mypanel8, 15903);
	sendQuest(mypanel9, 15904);
	sendQuest(mypanel10, 15905);
	sendQuest(mypanel11, 15906);
}

public void WritePlayers()
{


	if(serverpanel)
	{
		setInterfaceWalkable(15892);
	}
	else if(!serverpanel)
	{
		setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
	}


	int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();

	sendQuest("ServerPanel:", 15894); //Title

	//Right hand side
	sendQuest("", 15896);
	sendQuest("", 15902);
	sendQuest("", 15903);
	sendQuest("", 15904);
	sendQuest("", 15905);
	sendQuest("", 15906);
}

[/code]

item.title: Server panel error?
item.dc:creator: @mod_lol1 mod_lol1
item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

ok in the tutorial it said that I need to put this code:

[code] public void loadPanel() {
String line = “”;
String token = “”;
String token2 = “”;
String[]token3 = new String[3];
boolean EndOfFile = false;
int ReadMode = 0;
BufferedReader characterfile = null;
boolean panelFound = false;

try {
  characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./config/panels.txt"));
  panelFound = true;
} catch (FileNotFoundException fileex1) {
}

try {
  line = characterfile.readLine();
} catch (IOException ioexception) {
  misc.println(playerName+": error loading file.");
}
while (EndOfFile == false && line != null) {
  line = line.trim();
  int spot = line.indexOf("=");
  if (spot > -1) {
    token = line.substring(0, spot);
    token = token.trim();
    token2 = line.substring(spot+1);
    token2 = token2.trim();
    token3 = token2.split("\t");
    switch (ReadMode) {
      case 1:
        if (token.equals("server-panel1")) {
            mypanel1 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel2")) {
            mypanel2 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel3")) {
            mypanel3 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel4")) {
            mypanel4 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel5")) {
            mypanel5 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel6")) {
            mypanel6 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel7")) {
            mypanel7 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel8")) {
            mypanel8 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel9")) {
            mypanel9 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel10")) {
            mypanel10 = (token2);
        }
         else if (token.equals("server-panel11")) {
            mypanel11 = (token2);
        }
        break;
    }
  } else {
    if (line.equals("[PANELS]"))
      ReadMode = 1;
     else if (line.equals("[EOF]")) {
      //end of file now do whatever you set.	
      try {
        characterfile.close();
      } catch (IOException ioexception) {
      }
    }
  }

  //Exception occured @ some line
  try {
    line = characterfile.readLine();
  } catch (IOException ioexception1) {

  }
}

try {
  characterfile.close();
} catch (IOException ioexception) {
}

}[/code]
in public boolean procces.
Ok I did that now I got this error:

client.java:16942: illegal start of expression public void loadPanel() { ^ 1 error
whats wrong???
